description: This file contains utility functions for validating height and weight ranges, calculating BMI, and categorizing BMI values within a Preference app. It is designed to have pure Dart logic without Flutter dependencies to allow for straightforward unit testing.

methods.name: isValidInclusiveRange
methods.description: Validates that both minValue and maxValue are non-null, finite numbers, and minValue <= maxValue.

methods.name: isValidHeightRangeCm
methods.description: Validates whether height boundaries in centimeters are within 80-250 cm and the range is logically valid.

methods.name: isValidWeightRangeKg
methods.description: Validates whether weight boundaries in kilograms are within 30-250 kg and the range is logically valid.

methods.name: calculateBmiKgCm
methods.description: Calculates BMI based on weight in kilograms and height in centimeters, returning NaN for invalid inputs.

methods.name: categorizeBmi
methods.description: Categorizes BMI into 'Underweight', 'Normal', 'Overweight', or 'Obesity' based on WHO standards.
